name: dockerized-full-stack-environment
description: Dockerized environment with a database, a back-end and a front-end application.

scripts.build:all: npm run build:fe && npm run build:be && npm run build:db
scripts.clone:fe: git clone https://github.com/uit-tgt/PD-001-UIT-FlowChart-FE.git PD-001-UIT-FlowChart-FE && cd PD-001-UIT-FlowChart-FE && npm install
scripts.clone:be: git clone https://github.com/uit-tgt/PD-001-UIT-FlowChart-BE.git PD-001-UIT-FlowChart-BE && cd PD-001-UIT-FlowChart-BE && npm install
scripts.clone:all: npm run clone:fe && npm run clone:be && npm run clone:do
scripts.pull:all: npm run pull:fe && npm run pull:be
scripts.pull:rebuild-all: npm run pull:all && npm run start:containers
scripts.pull:be-rebuild: npm run pull:be && npm run build:back && npm run start:back
scripts.pull:fe-rebuild: npm run pull:fe && npm run build:front && npm run start:front
